title: On the Fast Track: An Interview With Redbox CEO Galen Smith '98
itunes:title: On the Fast Track: An Interview With Redbox CEO Galen Smith '98
description: Galen Smith '98, CEO of Redbox, shares his journey to becoming a CEO in 2016, less than 20 years after graduating from Wheaton College.
